comments.author: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.text: The comments need some more cleanup as we are getting closer to done our changes there.
comments.raw_text: The comments need some more cleanup as we are getting closer to done our changes there.

comments.creator: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9142744
Bug 1632273 - Reorder {Immutable,Mutable}ScriptFlags flags. r?jorendorff!


Reorder and renumber the flags. All flag comments are entirely unchanged.
Follow-up patches will update those comments.
comments.raw_text:
Reorder and renumber the flags. All flag comments are entirely unchanged.
Follow-up patches will update those comments.
comments.author: tcampbell@mozilla.com
tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9142745
Bug 1632273 - Update ImmutableScriptFlags docs (Input). r?jandem!,jorendorff!


Update flag comments for "input" flags. These flags are not determined by the
source text generally come from CompileOptions instead. They are preserved on
scripts and stencils to know if bytecode can be reused.

Depends on D72164
comments.raw_text:
Update flag comments for "input" flags. These flags are not determined by the
source text generally come from CompileOptions instead. They are preserved on
scripts and stencils to know if bytecode can be reused.

Depends on D72164
comments.creator: tcampbell@mozilla.com
tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
These flags are derived by the parser and are set for all scripts
(top-level/function, lazy/non-lazy).

Depends on D72165
comments.text:
Created attachment 9142746
Bug 1632273 - Update ImmutableScriptFlags docs (Parse). r?jorendorff!


These flags are derived by the parser and are set for all scripts
(top-level/function, lazy/non-lazy).

Depends on D72165

comments.text:
Created attachment 9142747
Bug 1632273 - Update ImmutableScriptFlags docs (Function). r?jorendorff!


These flags are derived by the parser but are only defined for functions.

Depends on D72166
